comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: Реклама на www.ozon.ru при открытии страницы
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

3.6.11/54

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.ozon.ru

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Peter Lowe's Blocklist

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Annoyances, I don't care about cookies

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. На озоне при открытии сайта лезет реклама, которая зело задолбала, скрывается она спустя пару секунд после открытия сайта, но раздражает дико. Скрывается правилом www.ozon.ru##.tx но на её месте остаёися большой белый прямоугольник, который прыгает туда - сюда. Т.е. надо дорихтовывать ещё правилами или на JS, а тут уже мои полномочия - всё.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

В данном случае, это реклама МТС

![2024 01 30_13 18 20~01](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/12525093/8da7d3ad-010b-42dc-809d-801d24ef245c)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

p.s. Что промаркировать в опциях тикета стелс-режима при "высоком" уровне антитрекинга ?

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
